list_definition.definition: a person who designs buildings etc

list_ex_of_english: Remarkably not one of the architects we interviewed seemed to operate any regular evaluation of the success of a project after completion.
Too often the history of each district is presented as a series of lists: of buildings, of clients, of projects, of architects.
Many of the architects we interviewed claimed to have a substantial amount of 'repeat business'.
The de-skilling of the architect's role is not new.
In par ticular, agent-based simulations are proving useful for architects and town planners wishing to analyze their designs.
The designers were given a program brief of an architect's office space design and asked to focus on four different concerns in conceptual, schematic design.
The panels of regular review sessions comprise a mix of discipline groups, including architects, planners, councillors, landscape designers and community representatives.
Both these traditions are still rich sources for contemporary architects.
